Reviews.Title: Rated the 3 pack as excellent thinking it was the Laptop.
Reviews.Author: rigilsp
Reviews.Content: I would not buy the 3 pack anti glare screen protectors they don't fit this model.  The computer is EXCELLENT.  I read a review on Apple's new model SSD hard drive with rater's comments that it is not as repair friendly as this model.  I love this computer and highly recommend it with a 3 year service warranty through BH Photo less expensive than Apple.  Don't buy the 3 pack Anti glare Screen protectors they don't fit this screen.  I do recommend  the hard shell top of the line clear top and bottom case to protect your laptop investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow !
Reviews.Author: A. Lee
Reviews.Content: Ultra fast !!What a power house !!Worth the money !!I just wish that it came with a free carry case :)Nice service thanks :)
